item.title: Love video games? Then you’re a perfect scientist
item.author: David Robertson,
item.description: What if all the world’s not a stage, but a game? The men and women would still be players, but of a very different kind. And scientists would be the biggest gamers of all. When it comes to comparing gamers to scientists, the case is a compelling one. To do well in a game, the player must test out …

item.title: Volleyball destroy Southampton
item.author: David Robertson,
item.description: Hot on the heels of the Imperial Women’s Volleyball team steamrolling Nottingham 3-0, the Men’s team have floored Southampton 3-0 to advance to the final 8 of the BUCS tournament. Imperial’s 12-man squad was in the mood for a win, having just seen the basketball team beat City at Ethos. The tone was …

item.title: Playtime is over
item.author: David Robertson,
item.description: Why did I choose to stay at Clayponds Village, the Imperial postgraduate hall? Easy: I wanted to socialise and meet people. It’s been great fun so far. Welcome Week was packed with events, introducing me to a new gang of friends. The major parties, such as the recent Chinese New Year, have run …
